content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.

content: Good to meet you, Juan. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. As a landlord, I want to make sure that I am getting the best possible price for this property. May I ask what kind of budget you have in mind for the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am happy to negotiate. I am willing to pay the lowest price possible. Please let me know your offer.

I am a student and very responsible, so I am very interested in this apartment. I am also very dependable, so I am sure that I will pay the rent on time and take good care of the property. Thank you for considering my offer.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your willingness to negotiate, Juan. As a landlord, I am looking for a tenant who will provide me with a stable income and take good care of the property. name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I appreciate your offer, but I am looking for a lower price. Is there any possibility to lower the rental price?

As a student and a responsible person, I am sure that I can pay the rent on time and take good care of the property. I am also willing to sign a long-term lease agreement to provide stability for both of us. Thank you for your consideration.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your response, Juan. I understand your desire for a lower rental price, and I am willing to consider your request.
